[RoadLightRailIntersectionSolutions]

;piece DD01

;Added 072204 ~ Tropod
;double diagonal road, straight lightrail
;piece DD06

;piece DD12

;Added 060905 ~ Tropod
;orthogonal road + intersection,diagonal lightrail
;1

TYPE3=0x02020202,0x00000301,0x5F871000,2,0

;orthogonal road T intersection,diagonal lightrail
;1a

TYPE3=0x02020200,0x01000003,0x5F871200,2,1

;road dead end,diagonal lightrail

;road orthogonalxdiagonal intersection, diagonal lightrail ~ in order to build elevatedrail overhead whole junction, road junctions need to be kept seperate. i.e. not dragged through orthogonally.
;1a
TYPE1=0x02030100,0x03010000,0x5F872000,0,0
TYPE2=0x03010002,0x01000003,0x5F872000,1,0
TYPE3=0x01000203,0x00000301,0x5F872000,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020301,0x00030100,0x5F872000,3,0
TYPE5=0x01020003,0x03010000,0x5F872000,1,1
TYPE6=0x03010200,0x00030100,0x5F872000,2,1
TYPE7=0x00030102,0x00000301,0x5F872000,3,1
TYPE8=0x02000301,0x01000003,0x5F872000,0,1
;1b
TYPE1=0x02030100,0x00000301,0x5F872100,0,0
TYPE2=0x03010002,0x00030100,0x5F872100,1,0
TYPE3=0x01000203,0x03010000,0x5F872100,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020301,0x01000003,0x5F872100,3,0
TYPE5=0x02000301,0x00030100,0x5F872100,0,1
TYPE6=0x03010200,0x01000003,0x5F872100,2,1
TYPE7=0x01020003,0x00000301,0x5F872100,1,1
TYPE8=0x00030102,0x03010000,0x5F872100,3,1
;1c orthogonal extra ~ to allow orthogonal drawing right through the junction once elevated rail has been built overhead
TYPE1a=0x02000203,0x03010000,0x5F872100,2,0
TYPE1b=0x02030200,0x00000301,0x5F872100,0,0
TYPE2a=0x00020302,0x01000003,0x5F872100,3,0
TYPE2b=0x03020002,0x00030100,0x5F872100,1,0
TYPE3a=0x01020002,0x00000301,0x5F872100,1,1
TYPE3b=0x00020102,0x03010000,0x5F872100,3,1
TYPE4a=0x02000201,0x00030100,0x5F872100,0,1
TYPE4b=0x02010200,0x01000003,0x5F872100,2,1

;Added 122906 ~ memo
;draggable GLR

TYPE3=0x01000001,0x02000200,0x5f880000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000101,0x00020002,0x5f880000,1,0
;Stub stability (stays GLR when other tile is bulldozed) Added ~ 20/04/2009 ~ Warrior
TYPE1a=0x00010100,0x02000000,0x5f880000,2,0
TYPE1b=0x00010100,0x00020000,0x5f880000,2,0
TYPE1c=0x00010100,0x00000200,0x5f880000,2,0
TYPE1d=0x00010100,0x00000002,0x5f880000,2,0

;--draggable Tram-in-Road--
;Added 01232013 by memo and Tarkus
;Ortho
TYPE0=0x02000200,0x00000000,0x58480000,0,0
TYPE1=0x00020002,0x00000000,0x58480000,1,0
;

TYPE1=0x00020002,0x00020002,0x58480000,1,0
;

TYPE2=0x02000200,0x00000200,0x58480000,0,0
TYPE3=0x00020002,0x00020000,0x58480000,1,0
;Stub
TYPE0=0x02000000,0x00000000,0x58487a00,2,0
TYPE1=0x00020000,0x00000000,0x58487a00,1,0
TYPE2=0x00000200,0x00000000,0x58487a00,0,0
TYPE3=0x00000002,0x00000000,0x58487a00,3,0
;90-Bend
TYPE0=0x02020000,0x00000000,0x58483000,0,0

;+-Intersection
TYPE0=0x02020202,0x00000000,0x58484100,0,0
